content: We are wondering if there are enough folks interested to warrant a v2-to-FHIR connectathon track in Sydney. If you are planning to be in Sydney and would participate, please let Hans or I know. Thanks.
I can be there the Monday. Flying in on Sunday.
Is there a time fixed for a V2-toFHIR discussion at Sydney? Will it be possible to dial in?
Two slots noted in the consolidated FHIR agenda, which is here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/FHIR+WGM+Agendas+2020-01

Is Friday Q0 the session that Grahame will join in? Is that at 7 am?

Could others join in via the V2-toFHIR conference call line?
